sentence.Network_en: Doran was clutching the bottle with both hands and sucking intently.
sentence.Network_cn: 多兰双手紧紧抓着瓶子尽情地喝着。

sentence.Network_en: He listened intently, then slammed down the phone.
sentence.Network_cn: 他专心地听着，然后砰地挂上电话。

sentence.Network_en: His eyes blazed intently into mine.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(I3) ... intentioned 企图 intently 专心地 intentness 热心.
intention 意图intently 一心一意intercept 截夺

list.abs: ...“Skopos“。除了Skopos，还使用了相关的“目标(aim)“、“目的(purpose)“、“意图(intention)“和“功能(function)“等词。为了避免概念混淆，提议对意图和功能作基本的区分：“意图“是从发.
法律词汇_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... 意图 intention 意向 intention 溢价 premium.
SAT词汇_百度文库 ... instinctive adj. 直觉的 intentional adj. 故意的 logical adj. 逻辑的.
新东方六级高频词汇整理_百度文库 ... inspirational a. 灵感的 intent a. 专心的，专注的 intricate a. 复杂精细的.

entry.def: If you are intent on doing something, you are eager and determined to do it.

example.ex: The rebels are obviously intent on keeping up the pressure...
example.tran: 叛乱分子显然决心继续施压。

example.ex: The play starred a well-known retired actress who was intent on a come-back.
example.tran: 该剧由一名志在复出的著名隐退女演员主演。

entry.def: If someone does something in an intent way, they pay great attention to what they are doing.

example.ex: She looked from one intent face to another...
example.tran: 她看着一张张专注的面孔。

example.ex: Rodney had been intent on every word.

entry.def: A person's intent is their intention to do something.

example.ex: ...a strong statement of intent on arms control...
example.tran: 决心实施军备控制的有力声明

example.ex: Two men will appear before Birmingham magistrates' court today charged with possession of arms with intent to endanger life.
example.tran: 两名男子今天将在伯明翰地方法庭受审,他们被控持有武器，企图危害他人生命。

entry.tran: 差不多等于;几乎在一切方面
entry.def: You say to all intents and purposes to suggest that a situation is not exactly as you describe it but the effect is the same as if it were.

example.ex: To all intents and purposes he was my father.
example.tran: 他几乎可以称得上是我的父亲。

auth_sentence.content: Seven small pairs of eyes were watching us intently.
auth_sentence.res_content: Seven small pairs of eyes were watching us intently.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Seven small pairs of eyes were watching us intently.

auth_sentence.content: Retiree Ernie Rudolph listened intently to Paul's speech.
auth_sentence.res_content: Retiree Ernie Rudolph listened intently to Paul's speech.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Retiree Ernie Rudolph listened intently to Paul's speech.

auth_sentence.content: Of course you listen to the opposition intently.
auth_sentence.res_content: Of course you listen to the opposition intently.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Of course you listen to the opposition intently.

sentences.en: He sat very erect, listening intently.
He was looking at her intently but she stared him out.
sentences.cn: 他专注地看着她,可她盯得他移开了目光。

sentences.en: I could see a man staring at me intently.
sentences.cn: 我能看到有个男人专注地盯着我看。
